title: How do I enable GPS?
answer:
Swipe downwards from the status bar and select the GPS shortcut switch to quickly turn GPS positioning on or off. 

 If you want more accurate positioning or wish to reduce battery drain, you can go to Settings, select location services or location access and then choose your preferred location methods such as Wi-Fi, mobile data or A-GPS.
keywords: GPS, navigation, location, enable, disable, location access, location services
